name: Jia Li 0004
content: Jia Li's Homepage Jia Li (李佳) I am the Assistant Professor of College of AI at Tsinghua University. I obtained my PhD degree from Peking University in 2025, supervised by Prof. Zhi Jin and Prof. Ge Li. My research lies in the intersection of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Software Engineering (SE). Specifically, my research interests include: AI for SE (aka. Intelligent Software Engineering): We develop AI techniques for improving the efficiency and quality of software development, such as code generation, test generation, and code repair. SE for AI: We explore SE techniques for improving the performance and reliability of AI systems. I am looking for highly-motivated interns to join my research group. Feel free to email me with your resume attached. 长期招收线上/线下科研实习生，可提供工位、定期一对一讨论，欢迎优秀本科生和研究生联系我，请附带上简历。 jia_li(at)mail.tsinghua.edu.cn Google Scholar GitHub Twitter ORCID News 2025 Our paper (DAVSP) has been accepted by AAAI 2026. Nov 08 Our paper (AdapTrack) has been accepted by ICSE 2026. Oct 16 Our paper (M2CVD) has been accepted by TOSEM 2025. Oct 09 Our paper (aiXcoder-7B-v2) has been accepted by ASE 2025. Sep 26 Congratulations! Four of our papers were accepted by NeurIPS 2025, including one Spotlight and three Poster papers! Sep 19 I joined the College of AI at Tsinghua University as an assistant professor! Aug 01 I passed the defense of my PhD thesis! May 22 Congratulation, our two papers are accepted by ACL 2025! May 16 Our paper Line-level Semantic Structure Learning for Code Vulnerability Detection has been accepted by Internetware 2025. Apr 16 Our paper Escalating LLM-based Code Translation Benchmarking into the Class-level Era has been accepted by ISSTA 2025.
